```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

# Load the msleep dataset
data(msleep)

# Remove incomplete data
msleep <- na.omit(msleep)

# Create the bar graph
S <- ggplot(msleep, aes(x = reorder(vore, sleep_total), y = sleep_total, fill = vore)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("red", "green", "blue", "yellow")) +
  labs(title = "Hours of Sleep by Diet Type", x = "Diet Type", y = "Hours of Sleep") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), legend.position = "none")

# Make the graph interactive and animated
ggplotly(S, transition = list(easing = "linear", duration = 500))

S
```
